Title: Relates to warnings regarding two-point seat belts
Summary: Requires the commissioner of DMV to provide applicants for registration of vehicles manufactured before 2009 with informational materials informing them of the hazards associated with a two-point seat belt.
LawCode: Amd ยง401, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to warnings regarding two-point seat belts
